changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE security.session ( user_name VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT FK_7854_security_session_user_name FOREIGN KEY (user_name) REFERENCES security.user_name (user_name) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, session_id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT pg_catalog.uuid_generate_v4(), create_time TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), end_time TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT (now() + interval '8 hour'), update_time TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT true, visible BOOLEAN DEFAULT true, flags INT );
